name: Few Seconds
description:
A small ball of hair named Poipoil lost objects.

We must find them soon, but it is not so simple!

You have little time and there are obstacles like holes or cacti.

Help him and he will be your friend!

The game is still in development version, so it may change and there are bugs.

My Twitter page: https://twitter.com/Electromicro1

My Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Electronicmicroprossegames/

My blog :  https://electronicmicropro.wixsite.com/electromicroMy blog :  https://electronicmicropro.wixsite.com/electromicro

Remember to share Few Seconds and report bugs to me for corrections.

Thank you!
